menu.name: Playback Rate
menu.desc: Options for Playback Rate! The higher the number, the faster the song will go.

number.name: Playback Rate
number.desc: Change the playback rate! The higher, the faster the song will go by.

checkbox.name: Change Midsong
checkbox.desc: If checked, the playback rate will be adjustable mid song by using the keys Q and E.

checkbox.name: Bot Play
checkbox.desc: If checked, the computer will play the song for you, no hands needed!

checkbox.name: Show Combo Display
checkbox.desc: If checked, the COMBO sprite will appear every time you hit a note unless you break a combo.

checkbox.name: Skip Loading Screen
checkbox.desc: If checked, the game won't lead you to the loading screen in Story Mode.

checkbox.name: Flashing Lights
checkbox.desc: If checked, flashing lights will occur. Turn off if you are sensitive to these!

checkbox.name: Show FPS Counter
checkbox.desc: If checked, the debug text (FPS + RAM counter + misc shits) on the top left will appear.

checkbox.name: Lane Underlay
checkbox.desc: If checked, oh look lane underlay. helps for easier reading if ur diagnosed with blind

checkbox.name: Fullscreen
checkbox.desc: If checked, actually nah this explains itself lol

number.name: Hit Window
number.desc: The 'window' of when you can hit a note perfectly. (Does not apply to 'Toast' and Depart'!)
